report.title: Taxon meanings at transect
report.description: Returns the list of taxon meanings ever recorded at a UKBMS transect.
report.query: SELECT distinct o.taxon_meaning_id FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN samples sp ON sp.id=s.parent_id AND sp.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND sp.location_id=#location_id# AND o.survey_id=#survey_id#

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Provide the survey to display records for
